provisions.title: Interpretation
provisions.content: In this Act, unless the context otherwise requires,“Board” means the governing body of the National Vaccine Institute established under section 4;“Institute” means the National Vaccine Institute established under section 1;“Minister” means the Minister responsible for Health;“relevant regulatory body” means a regulatory body which has functions related to vaccine research, development and manufacturing;“sera” means products that take disease fighting molecules that are antibodies from the blood of a recovered patient or recovered animal and transferred to the sick to boost the defences of the sick;“vaccine developer” means a public or private institution that is involved in vaccine research and development; and“vaccine” means any substance designed to be administered to a human being for the prevention of one or more diseases. In this Act, unless the context otherwise requires, “Board” means the governing body of the National Vaccine Institute established under section 4; “Institute” means the National Vaccine Institute established under section 1; “Minister” means the Minister responsible for Health; “relevant regulatory body” means a regulatory body which has functions related to vaccine research, development and manufacturing; “sera” means products that take disease fighting molecules that are antibodies from the blood of a recovered patient or recovered animal and transferred to the sick to boost the defences of the sick; “vaccine developer” means a public or private institution that is involved in vaccine research and development; and “vaccine” means any substance designed to be administered to a human being for the prevention of one or more diseases.
